BBEX3.M.ZMW.USD.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Zambia  / USD 1 = ZMW ... (middle)

General: With effect from 1 January 2013, a currency conversion took place at the rate of 1,000 (old) kwacha = 1 (new) kwacha; the old ISO currency code was ZMK. The currency conversion did not entail any appreciation or depreciation against other currencies.
Source: Calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the Bank of Zambia, Lusaka.
